duties: Gained hands-on experience at DGDA (Direction Générale des Douanes et Accises) performing support services, verification follow-up, and service brigade duties.
Managing customs operations, ensuring compliance with declarations, and overseeing warehouse operations.
Providing practical exposure to international trade and customs procedures.
Gained valuable exposure to financial operations at GECAMINES, a major mining corporation, through hands-on experience with financial statements and industry-specific reporting procedures.
Assisted with basic accounting procedures while developing practical understanding of financial reporting in the mining sector.
